data.text: Me ba, sɛ woadi akagyinamu ama ɔyɔnko bi,
sɛ nea wokae ayi ka ama wo
ɛno de yɛ eyi, me ba, na fa tetew wo ho,
Mma wʼani nkum
Gye wo ho, sɛnea ɔforote guan fi ɔbɔmmɔfo nsam
Ɔkwadwofo, kɔ ɔtɛtea nkyɛn;
Onni ɔsahene,
nanso ɔde aduan sie wɔ ahuhurubere mu,
Wo, ɔkwadwofo, wobɛda akosi da bɛn?
Nna kakra, nkotɔ kakra,
ɛbɛma ohia aba wo so sɛ ɔkwanmukafo
Onipa teta ne ohuhuni a
nea obu nʼani,
nea ɔde ne koma mu nnaadaa bɔ pɔw bɔne,
Ɛno nti amanehunu bɛba no so prɛko pɛ;
Nneɛma asia na Awurade mpɛ,
ani a ɛtra ntɔn,
koma a edwen amumɔyɛ ho,
ɔdansekurumni a odi atoro
Me ba, tie wʼagya ahyɛde
Fa kyekyere wo koma ho daa;
Wonantew a, ɛbɛkyerɛ wo kwan;
Na saa ahyɛde yi yɛ kanea
ɛtwe wo fi ɔbea a onni suban pa no ho,
Mma wo kɔn nnɔ nʼahoɔfɛ,
efisɛ oguamanfo ma wʼanuonyam yɛ sɛ brodosin,
Obi betumi asɔ gya agu ne srɛ so a
Obi betumi anantew nnyansramma so a
Saa na ɔbarima a ɔne ɔbarima foforo yere da no te;
Nnipa mmu ɔkorɔmfo a wakowia ade animtiaa
Mmom, sɛ wɔkyere no a, ɛsɛ sɛ otua mmɔho ason;
Ɔbarima a ɔsɛe aware no nni adwene;
Ɔhwe ne animguase na obenya,
Ninkutwe hwanyan okunu abufuw
Ɔrennye mpata biara;
